signin.name: Sign In
signin.signupName: Don`t have any account? Sign Up then!

home.description:
Where am I? is an exciting game in which you have to guess the location
by looking at panoramic images. The goal of the game is to
guess the location where the panorama is located: whoever guesses closer to the
to the actual location, wins
home.firstFeature: Explore different parts of the world and discover new places
home.secondFeature: Use your logical thinking and knowledge of the locations to win
home.thirdFeature: Compete with friends or coworkers or improve your game performance in a singleplayer
